create_date.name: create_date
create_date.tooltip: The date the note was created.  This field is read-only.

parse_as_csv.name: parse_as_csv
parse_as_csv.text: Parsed using comma separated value format

df_max_incident_id.name: df_max_incident_id
df_max_incident_id.tooltip: Enter incident # for upper range or 0 to indicate all incidents

df_min_incident_id.name: df_min_incident_id
df_min_incident_id.tooltip: Enter an incident # or 0 to indicate the start of all incidents

rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_id.name: rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_id
rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_id.tooltip: The identifier of the asset group.

rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_ids.name: rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_ids
rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_ids.tooltip: The identifier of the asset group. Separated by ",".

rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_name.name: rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_name
rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_name.tooltip: A search pattern for the name of the asset group. Searches are case-insensitive contains.

rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_sort.name: rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_sort
rapid7_insight_vm_asset_group_sort.tooltip: The criteria to sort the records by, in the format: property[,ASC|DESC]. The default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria can be specified using multiple sort query parameters.

rapid7_insight_vm_asset_id.name: rapid7_insight_vm_asset_id
rapid7_insight_vm_asset_id.tooltip: The identifier of the asset(asset id).

rapid7_insight_vm_assets.name: rapid7_insight_vm_assets
rapid7_insight_vm_assets.tooltip: Multiple criteria of <string> Specify asset addresses to be included in site scans.

rapid7_insight_vm_assets_sort.name: rapid7_insight_vm_assets_sort
rapid7_insight_vm_assets_sort.tooltip: Multiple criteria of <string>, The criteria to sort the records by, in the format: property[,ASC|DESC]. The default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria can be specified using multiple sort query parameters separated by a ';'.

rapid7_insight_vm_engine_id.name: rapid7_insight_vm_engine_id
rapid7_insight_vm_engine_id.tooltip: The identifier of a scan engine. Default scan engine is selected when not specified.

rapid7_insight_vm_hosts.name: rapid7_insight_vm_hosts
rapid7_insight_vm_hosts.tooltip: Multiple criteria of <string> The hosts that should be included as a part of the scan. This should be a mixture of IP Addresses and host names as a comma separated string array.

rapid7_insight_vm_scan_name.name: rapid7_insight_vm_scan_name
rapid7_insight_vm_scan_name.tooltip: <string> The user-driven scan name for the scan.

rapid7_insight_vm_scan_template_id.name: rapid7_insight_vm_scan_template_id
rapid7_insight_vm_scan_template_id.tooltip: <string> The identifier of a scan template. Use nexpose-get-report-templates to get all templates, default scan template is selected when not specified. .

rapid7_insight_vm_scans_sort.name: rapid7_insight_vm_scans_sort
rapid7_insight_vm_scans_sort.tooltip: Multiple criteria of <string> The criteria to sort the records by, in the format: property[,ASC|DESC]. The default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria can be specified using multiple sort query parameters separated by a ';'.

rapid7_insight_vm_site_id.name: rapid7_insight_vm_site_id
rapid7_insight_vm_site_id.tooltip: Id of the site to delete.

rapid7_insight_vm_site_importance.name: rapid7_insight_vm_site_importance
rapid7_insight_vm_site_importance.tooltip: <string> The site importance. Defaults to "normal" if not specified.

rapid7_insight_vm_site_name.name: rapid7_insight_vm_site_name
rapid7_insight_vm_site_name.tooltip: <string> The site name. Name must be unique.

rapid7_insight_vm_sites_sort.name: rapid7_insight_vm_sites_sort
rapid7_insight_vm_sites_sort.tooltip: Multiple criteria of <string> The criteria to sort the records by, in the format: property[,ASC|DESC]. The default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria can be specified using multiple sort query parameters separated by a ';'.

rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerabilities_sort.name: rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerabilities_sort
rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerabilities_sort.tooltip: The criteria to sort the records by, in the format: property[,ASC|DESC]. The default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria can be specified using multiple sort query parameters.

rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exceptio.name: rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exception_comment
rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exceptio.tooltip: A comment from the submitter as to why the exception was submitted.

rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exceptio.name: rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exception_reason
rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exceptio.tooltip: The reason the vulnerability exception was submitted.

rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exceptio.name: rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exception_state
rapid7_insight_vm_vulnerability_exceptio.tooltip: The state of the vulnerability exception.

relating.name: relating
relating.label_null: The 'Artifact Type default setting' option is not supported now. Please select the other two options

created.name: created
created.tooltip: The date the attachment was created.  This field is read-only.

org_last_modified_time.name: org_last_modified_time
org_last_modified_time.text: Last Modified Time of user in organization

init_date.name: init_date
init_date.tooltip: Most recent date the task was added to an incident.

private.name: private
private.tooltip: Whether or not the task is private.

is_assignable.name: is_assignable
is_assignable.tooltip: When enabled, the group can be selected as an incident owner.

is_default_owner.name: is_default_owner
is_default_owner.tooltip: Checking this checkbox make this the default owner.

is_task_assignable.name: is_task_assignable
is_task_assignable.tooltip: When enabled, the group can be selected as a task owner.

received_date.name: received_date
received_date.tooltip: The date the email was received.

sent_date.name: sent_date
sent_date.tooltip: The date the email was sent.

addr.name: addr
addr.tooltip: Physical location of the incident, if applicable

automatic_score.name: automatic_score
automatic_score.tooltip: A numerical representation of the case severity. Values range from -10 to 10.

confirmed.name: confirmed
confirmed.tooltip: Tag an issue as an unconfirmed (event) vs. a confirmed incident.

values.label: Ascension and Tristan Da Cunha Saint Helena
Hong Kong S.A.R. of the PRC
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
The Democratic Republic of the Congo

create_date.name: create_date
create_date.tooltip: The date the incident was created. This field is read-only.

cumulative_score.name: cumulative_score
cumulative_score.tooltip: [Deprecated, please use Automatic Score] A numerical representation of the XDR severity. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0, where 0.0 indicates absence of risk and 1.0 indicates maximum risk.

data_compromised.name: data_compromised
data_compromised.text: Was personal information or personal data involved?
data_compromised.tooltip: Determine whether personal information/data was foreseeably involved, disclosed, compromised, accessed, altered, destroyed, damaged, lost or inaccessible.

data_contained.name: data_contained
data_contained.tooltip: Whether the exposure has been addressed and rectified.

data_encrypted.name: data_encrypted
data_encrypted.tooltip: Whether the data in question was encrypted. Data should not be considered encrypted if the encryption keys were also breached.

data_format.name: data_format
data_format.tooltip: Specify the format of the personal information involved.

data_source_ids.name: data_source_ids
data_source_ids.tooltip: Original source of the data, such as the name of the database.

dc_impact_likely.name: dc_impact_likely
dc_impact_likely.text: Impact Likely for District of Columbia

description.name: description
description.tooltip: A free form text description of the incident.

determined_date.name: determined_date
determined_date.tooltip: Date you determined whether or not the incident involved a breach of personal information or personal data. Regulatory task timelines will be derived from this date and time.

due_date.name: due_date
due_date.tooltip: The nearest date for the next task due. This field is read-only.

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.tooltip: The date the incident was closed. This field is read-only.

gdpr_harm_risk.name: gdpr_harm_risk
gdpr_harm_risk.tooltip: Likelihood and severity of the risk to the rights and freedoms of the data subject, as defined by the GDPR.

gdpr_lawful_data_processing_categories.name: gdpr_lawful_data_processing_categories
gdpr_lawful_data_processing_categories.tooltip: Under the GDPR, processing of personal or sensitive data is only lawful if one or more of these categories applies.

values.label: Protection of vital interests of data subject
Legitimate interests of data controller or third party

harmstatus_id.name: harmstatus_id
harmstatus_id.tooltip: Different jurisdictions use harm, risk, misuse, ID theft, and other standards as safe harbors from notification. Interpretation of these terms has frequently been the subject of litigation.

inc_last_modified_date.name: inc_last_modified_date
inc_last_modified_date.tooltip: The date the incident was last modified.This field is read only.

inc_training.name: inc_training
inc_training.tooltip: Whether the incident is a simulation or a regular incident. This field is read-only.

name.name: name
name.tooltip: A unique name to identify this particular incident.

negative_pr_likely.name: negative_pr_likely
negative_pr_likely.tooltip: If it is foreseeable that the incident might generate any negative public image or publicity for your company or organization.

nist_attack_vectors.name: nist_attack_vectors
nist_attack_vectors.tooltip: NIST Attack Vectors the incident falls under, if applicable.

reporter.name: reporter
reporter.tooltip: Name of person who reported the event, such as a device owner or his/her manager

resolution_id.name: resolution_id
resolution_id.tooltip: Select an option that accurately describes the reason for closing this incident.

resolution_summary.name: resolution_summary
resolution_summary.tooltip: Enter a summary that describes how this incident was resolved.

score.name: score
score.tooltip: The automated assessment of the case.

severity_code.name: severity_code
severity_code.tooltip: Your impression of the events relative severity vs. other events that may be entered into the system.
